title: I Escaped 15 Years of MLM
description:
Self proclaimed “Crypto Craig”, joins Lauren and Jeremy to rehash his time involved in multi-level marketing.

Go to https://Purple.com/wild10 and use code wild10. For a limited time you can get 10% off any order of $200 or more.
Visit https://OnePeloton.com to learn more about achieving your fitness goals. 
This podcast is sponsored by BetterHelp and Wild 'Til 9 listeners get 10% off their first month at https://BetterHelp.com/wt9
Make your first good decision of the new year, and join over 10 million people using Chime. Get started at https://chime.com/wt9
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
